name: Deception IV: The Nightmare Princess
summary:
The Nightmare Princess introduces the new character Valgyrie, who is able to set traps as well as directly attack enemies by kicking. The player can deal damage to an enemy by stomping on them after they have fallen to the ground, or kick them into traps. 
 
Modes 
The main feature of the game is called the Quest Mode, which features 100 new quests to complete. In it, the player plays as Valgyrie, and is able to obtain new traps and abilities. 
 
The game will also include an option titled Deception Studio, which allows players to create their own characters, enemies, and missions. Parts for Deception Studio can be acquired by playing Quest Mode.

alternative_names.name: 影牢 ～もう1人のプリンセス～

esrb.synopsis: This is an action game in which players assume the roles of the Devil's Daughters as they attempt to defeat foes and revive their father. Players battle enemies by placing traps around grid-like battlefields. Enemies lured to traps can be killed by giant swinging axes, walls of spikes, bladed wooden horses, and other sharp instruments that can impale characters. Characters emit large splashes of blood when injured, and blood is occasionally shown pooling under dying characters. Players can knock off enemy armor with an “Armor Break,” reducing them to their underwear in the case of females. One character, nicknamed “the Masochistic Sorceress,” gets extremely excited at any mention of pain and humiliation (e.g., "You're ordering me around like a dog...I love it!" and "Come on! Give it to me!").

pegi.synopsis: This game was rated PEGI 16 for strong sustained violence. Not suitable for persons under 16 years of age.
